main event: On 14 Apr 1960, an unidentified cylindrical object was observed near Bitburg Air Base, Germany.
interesting points: The object was observed at an estimated altitude of 50,000 ft.,The object made a rapid ascent and descent,It was approximately 60-70 ft in length,The sighting lasted for about 15 minutes,The report concludes the sighting as possibly an astronomical phenomenon.
witness description: Captain Robert J. Berger, U.S. Air Force
